pages.text: Oh, so you're an Advancement Hunter with style. With Paginated Advancements installed, you will find Spectrum's advancements using new, unique frames.$(br)Find out what each frame means on these following pages.

pages.title: Milestones
pages.recipe: Marks the start and end of an advancement tree: major milestones in your journey.

pages.title: Structure Building
pages.recipe: Advancements using this frame show you that you have a new structure to build.

pages.title: Adv. with Unlocks
pages.text: Advancements using this slightly altered frame have some kind of unlock attached to them: new recipes, a new revelation or something else. The default frame is used for advancements without additional unlocks, for all you completionists out there.

pages.title: Shitpost Advancements
pages.text: These are purely optional meme advancements without any unlocks.$(br)$(italic)Sometimes I just feel like shitposting, ok?
